title: Catoctin Mountain Park: Traveling Trunks
body: Traveling Trunks      An educational traveling trunk filled with treasures, pieces of our past, linking the local school curriculum with our park's heritage. Five discovery units, objects, artifacts, teacher background information, and suggested student activities included. Teachers are responsible for trunk pick-up and return to Park. No cost. To request the loan of the traveling trunk contact (301) 663-9388.         Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Catoctin Mountain Park Close Encounters of the Catoctin Kind   (4TH - 6TH Grades, Ages 9-11)THEME: Cultural HeritageUnits: Native American Indians, African Americans, Charcoal/Iron Industry, Sawmill and Whiskey Still Industries.An educational traveling trunk filled with treasures, pieces of our past, linking the local school curriculum with our park's heritage.
